hero.description: Platform of young Moroccans fighting for justice, quality education, and healthcare for all. Join us and be part of the change

hero.title: Our Vision for Freedom
hero.description: Gen Z 212 envisions a Morocco where transparency replaces corruption, where justice serves all citizens equally, and where the voice of the people shapes our collective future. This is our roadmap to liberation.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.desc: Exposing corruption and holding power accountable through radical transparency.

justice.title: Justice
justice.desc: Fighting for equal rights and fair treatment for all citizens.

unity.title: Unity
unity.desc: Building bridges across communities, cultures, and generations.

voice.title: Voice
voice.desc: Amplifying the unheard and giving power to the people.

education.title: Education
education.desc: Empowering through knowledge, critical thinking, and civic awareness.

solidarity.title: Solidarity
solidarity.desc: Standing together for collective liberation and mutual support.

vision.roadmapDesc: Our strategic plan for achieving systemic change through grassroots organizing, transparency, and collective action.

phase1.title: Awakening
phase1.subtitle: 2024-2025: Building Awareness
phase1.goal1: Reach 500K+ community members across all platforms
phase1.goal2: Launch corruption database with 100+ documented cases
phase1.goal3: Establish local chapters in 12 major cities
phase1.goal5: Build coalition with 50+ civil society organizations

phase2.title: Mobilization
phase2.subtitle: 2025-2026: Building Power
phase2.goal1: Organize nationwide peaceful protests and demonstrations
phase2.goal3: Establish legal defense fund for activists

phase4.title: Liberation
phase4.subtitle: 2027+: A Free Morocco
phase4.goal3: Ensure freedom of press and expression

cta.title: Join the Movement
cta.description: The future of Morocco depends on our collective action. Every voice matters, every action counts. Together, we can build the free and just society we deserve.
